remarks: The given periodic function ` F ` has a left limit at every point in the reals.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem49.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem49.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem49.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem49.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem49.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem49.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem49.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem49.d $e |- ( ph -> D C_ RR ) $.
fourierdlem49.f $e |- ( ph -> F : D --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem49.dper $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( x + ( k x. T ) ) e. D ) $.
fourierdlem49.per $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` ( x + ( k x. T ) ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fourierdlem49.cn $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) e. ( ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem49.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ..^ M ) ) -> L e. ( ( F |` ( ( Q ` i ) (,) ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) limCC ( Q ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem49.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem49.z $e |- Z = ( x e. RR |-> ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) $.
fourierdlem49.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( Z ` x ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem49 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F |` ( -oo (,) X ) ) limCC X ) =/= (/) ) $.
